name: Gambling Gauntlet
description:
Want to test your luck? If so well, you're in luck!
Fight against 5 enemies one after the other all whilst testing your luck of whether you can out-luck your opponent (and yourself!)!!

Controls:

Attack moves are located in the top left. Your attacks are essentially Dice, you deal damage based on said roll. To restart game press R

Attacks: 

Basic Roll: 1 - 6 (1 Dice). Has infinite uses

1.5x Basic Roll: Same as Basic Roll, but with 50% more damage. Has 8 uses

Double Roll: 2 - 12 (2 Dice). Has 5 uses

1.5x Double Roll: Same as Double Roll, but with 50% more damage. Has 2 uses
